title: CompTIA Security+ Certification
description: A globally recognized cybersecurity certification validating core skills in network security, risk management, incident response, and threat analysis.

title: TestOut Ethical Hacker Pro
description: Hands-on ethical hacking training focused on penetration testing, vulnerability assessment, and offensive security techniques through simulation-based labs.

title: ISC2 Certified in Cybersecurity (CC)
description: Entry-level cybersecurity certification demonstrating core security knowledge in access control, network security, cryptography, and business continuity planning.

title: TestOut Hybrid Server Pro: Core
description: Covers key Windows Server administration skills including server configuration, virtualization, networking, and hybrid cloud fundamentals.

title: Registered Engineer
description: Professional engineering license validating expertise in electronic engineering, automation systems, robotics, and applied engineering practices.

title: Foundations of Project Management
description: Introductory project management course covering project planning, communication strategies, workflow management, and team coordination.
